id.description: A unique name for the fingerspelling which is also a gloss.

is_two_handed.description: Whether the sign is two-handed or not.

etymology.description: Unlocalized etymological values regarding this sign's origin

sign.description: The name of the sign such that it could be found in a sign language dictionary.

signwriting.description: Scripts for representing a sign as characters.

swu.description: The [SignWriting with Unicode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SignWriting) representation of the sign.

video.description: Videos of the sign being performed, by format.

gif.description: A link to a gif of the sign being signed.

mp4.description: a link to an mp4 of the sign being signed.

parameters.description: Partly localized descriptions of how a sign is signed.

handshape.description: The shape of the hand when signing, identified by its name in ASL. Should not be translated in any language other than Toki Pona

movement.description: The motion of the hand when signing.

placement.description: The placement of the hand when signing.

orientation.description: The orientation of the hand when signing.

__schema0.description: A URL pointing to some external resource.
